author: shachor
msg: The files in the iis_netscape directory are now part of the following directories:

author: shachor
msg: The IIS directory contains files that are part of the ISAPI plugin

author: shachor
msg: The netscape directory contains files that are common to all the web servers

author: shachor
msg: The JK directory contains files that are common to all the web servers

author: costin
msg: Added Request/Response recycling to PoolConnection and HttpAdapter.
This is just the first step - we need to do it for Ajp and Jni too.
For SimpleConnection - I guess there is no need to spend time on it
right now, but keep it simple. We should choose what components are to
be used in the "production" mode and spend the most time on them.
